headline: Invest in These 5 Big Data Behemoths to Tap Wall Street Rally
summary: Five big data leaders - FICO, TDC, FFIV, SPGI and MCO - are leveraging AI, analytics and acquisitions to capture rising data demand.

headline: Morgan Stanley Raises S&P Global (SPGI) PT to $627 on Robust Year-End Debt Issuance Surge
summary: S&P Global Inc. (NYSE:SPGI) is one of the best future stocks to buy for the long term. On January 13, Morgan Stanley raised its price target on S&P Global to $627 from $620 and maintained an Overweight rating on the shares.
